segments.advisor_message: Alright, let's talk about your dependents. Can you provide me with the full name of your child or whoever's considered a dependent?
segments.client_message: Um, yeah, I think it's... wait no, I might've said the wrong name before. It's actually Jamie, not Alex, I mean, that's just messed up...

segments.advisor_message: Got it, Jamie it is. Now, when's Jamie's birthday?
segments.client_message: Right, right, um, Jamie was born on 15-03-2015. No wait, no, it was 15-03-2016, I'm so confused, haha! Like, I keep second guessing myself!
